text:
Thanks everyone for coming last night! Grand success. Mentioned this to a few folks at the event, but would love to do these monthly or bi-monthly. There‚Äôs certainly enough of us here to get a strong showing, and get to do more in-person debates, banter, and demos.

Good summary thread of people, projects, and topics from <@UUK6Y29R8> <https://twitter.com/tangjeff0/status/1527972094629363712?s=20&t=dpIQn_oViY6RmT_jhoooQg>

- demo of <http://fermat.ws> by <https://twitter.com/polbaladas|@polbaladas> + <https://twitter.com/gerard_sgs|@gerard_sgs>
- demo of <http://thehumbleai.com> by <https://twitter.com/nilukas|@nilukas> + mahdi

attachments.fallback:
<https://twitter.com/Mappletons|@Mappletons>: FoC meet-up last night was a rare delight. No organised speakers, agenda, or sponsors. Just a roomy pub and good people

Plenty of chat on CRDTs, spreadsheets, HyperCard, & demos of dynamic mediums.

Thanks to everyone for coming and making it delightful. Will do another in June! <https://pbs.twimg.com/media/FTRhFeKWQAYH08Y.jpg>

text: Tentatively book June 24th on your calendars for the next one - I‚Äôll make an event page and DM it around within the next week. Very likely at the same place (it‚Äôs such a good pub for these kind of things!)
